alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:14PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Benton and northwestern Washington Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1213 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Watts to 3 miles northwest of Farmington. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and dime to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Siloam Springs... Farmington... Tontitown... Greenland... West Siloam Springs... Lake Francis... Walnut Grove... Wedington... Gallitin... Wheeler... Savoy... This includes Interstate 49 near mile marker 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
